1.title: Choices

choices: Gain muscle!
Gain weight!
Gain height!
11.content:
Inuyasha growled under his breath as the team had set up camp that night. It had been a full day of fighting demons. But what was the biggest upset was that they collected next to no shards of the Jewel of Four Souls! Not to mention that Inuyasha always felt like it was HE who did all the work around here. All everyone else did was just get in the way and get into trouble, to which HE had to rescue them from.

Inuyasha decided it was time to man up a little! It was time to augment his power! Then maybe he wouldn't have to everyone always falling in to peril. He'd be able to squash demons flat with no issue!

"Yeah..." He thought to himself as he smirked.

He laid back, looking up at the stars, and began to devise ideas on how to attain this new power. After a moment, he knew what he had to do. He had to...
11.title: The Big Idea

choices: Collect the jewel shards, back to the journey
Ask someone for solution
111.content:
After moments thinking what he should do, Inuyasha decided to go for a walk around the forest, searching for a place for him to workout. The images of him being strong, crushing the demons like insignificant bugs excited him.

"I better start exercising if I want to achieve that result" Inuyasha muttered to himself.

As for the warm up, he started to run toward the river which located quite far from their tent, purposely to be able to exercise without much disturbance.

He ran on the grassy rocky road, making his feet felt itchy. Also the dim light made him increasingly disturbed, but not because he couldn't see clearly in the dark, it was just he seemed a little bit sensitive that day.
It didn't take a long time before he could see the river, the water sparkling as it reflected the moonlight. Without wasting his time further, the half demon began his exercise, his body sweating after moment swinging Tessaiga, cutting some branches and small tress, shattering some rocks. He tried to improve his accuracy while seeing in the dark, trying to get a better focus.

After about half an hour of exercising, he began to get bored, knowing the fact that exercises wouldn't made himself a lot stronger, mostly in size and muscle. The white haired man began to worry and a bit desperate. Sighing slightly the half demon advanced his body to sitting position, trying to get comfortable he leaned himself on the rock near him.

"Maybe I should collect all the jewel shards then wish for a God-like body? but it would take a lot of time.."

Inhaling deeply, he felt the cold air stung his nostrils.

"Or maybe I should ask someone for solutions"

He jumped to his feet then walked around, trying to get his body relaxed, then he decided to..
111.title: Night Walk

choices: The gang wakes up, and gets going!
Inuyasha wakes up early, and sneaks off for some secret "training."
Shippou, somehow, spots the changes, and begins to question Inuyasha!
1111.content:
Inuyasha snuck back to camp, where everyone was still fast asleep. Inuyasha was about to lie down, and set sneak off the next day by himself for jewel shards, when he happened to glance over to Kagome. After that, he snuck a little closer. He had just remembered something.

Without making a single sound, he snuck over to her bag, and took a peek inside.

"Nnng... Inuyasha..." She mumbled. Inuyasha pulled back, freaked that she might wake up and see him going through her things. After she settled back down, Inuyasha carefully took the bag away, getting out of earshot.

Just outside of camp, Inuyasha started tearing through the bag.

"What the heck is half this crap!? No wonder she always feels so heavy!" Inuyasha growled to himself. He tossed out many objects that most females would find necessary for being out and about. A brush, a little lip gloss, a little money... And what the heck was this thing in a tube!? Inuyasha pulled it out, and looked at it briefly. "What's this... Some kind of... Candy?" Inuyasha's tonuge stretched out, and gave it a lick. It soon pulled back. "Bleh. Tastes like a sheep."

After a few more minutes of searching ang trying to learn how things worked, getting kind of lost as he almost forgot what he was searching for.

"Aha!" He pulled out the tiny jar that held the sum of their jewel shards. Inuyasha bit the cork off, and put them into his hand. Within that instant, he felt new energy now flowing through his body. However, looking over himself, nothing had changed as he wanted. He HAD the power, but at more so, he wanted to SEE the power.

"Geez, these things are frickin' useless!" He said, gripping them in his hand. He sighed. He was okay with the power, and he didn't want to give it up. "... Aha!" Inuyasha opened his mouth, and popped the jewels in one by one, making sure they wouldn't cut his mouth as he swallowed.

Inuyasha let out a sigh. They all made it down safely, and he patting his stomach, feeling better.

But something was strange. His stomach felt... harder. Pulling back the layers of his red kimono and white undershirt, he saw his abs had tightened! He already had a nice midsection, but now he had a set of genuine abs! The wavy curves alone was enough to satisfy the half-demon, but then he saw more changes coming about!

His shoulders had started to stretch outward, with his pecs filling in, layer by layer, spreading the collar just a little farther open. Immediately, he pulled back his sleeves to see his biceps welling up with new power as well, the little baseball sized muscle had started pumping up, becoming a nice softball size! His forearms began to enlarge as well, a big healthy vein running up the side. Inuyasha grinned confidently as he gave it a good flex.

Inuyasha could feel his pants starting to more frequently rub against his thighs. They were normally so roomy, but now they were starting to fill up with meat. Speaking of meat, Inuyasha's already well-endowed self had started to become even more so! His calves started to bulge as well, growing in proportion with the rest of his body.

As it was all done, Inuyasha looked over himself. He grinned, flexing his whole body. Although he was too lazy to take his clothes off, he just loved the feeling of being huge! He messily packed things into Kagome's bag, and started heading tword camp. He'd have to make sure his body was well covered up for now. The last thing he wanted was for one of his friends to see and start asking questions, or even worse, for them to catch on.

Inuyasha carefully set the bag down next to Kagome, and tiptoed away. He curled back up into a ball like a dog, and fell fast asleep.

The next morning...
1111.title: Indi-Jewels-Ton

choices: Inuyasha continues his morning hunt for shards.
Inuyasha returns to camp.
11112.content:
Lucky for Inuyasha, he awoke before anyone else did. Peeking around, he could see that the sun was barely even up! Although he barely had a decent night's sleep, he wasn't tired in the slightest! Maybe it was all the excess energy from the jewel... Either way, he felt great! He couldn't just sit here all and way for daybreak! He had to get out and try to find a few more shards to pump up his body!

-------------------------------------------

It wasn't easy for the half-demon. He had to search far and wide, and even then, all he could find were some lesser demons that were hardly worth the time; they didn't have any shards within them at all! That's probably why they were so easily defeated...

Suddenly, as Inuyasha was innocently walking, a huge spider seemed to explode from the ground! It hissed, it was made of rock, and appeared to have venom just dripping from it's large maw. Inuyasha didn't know much about spiders, other than the fact that they were to go "squish!" under his foot. However, this one would not prove as easy.

"Heh, I've been waitin' all morning for you..." Inuyasha said with a cocky grin, withdrawing the Tessaiga from it's sheath. The beast lunged forward, not knowing any better than to try to paralyze Inuyasha with it's deadly venom, before ripping the handsome half-demon's flesh to shreds.

Inuyasha easily dodged, and slashed at the beast. He managed to carve a nice slit into the stone body. It cried out in pain, before releasing a web from it's behind, sticking Inuyasha's legs together. He fell forward, as the beast jumped back, and dove in again, ready to paralyze then man, when Inuyasha barely managed to get to his feet.

"Grr... Better not let this drag out..." He growled to himself. "Wind Scar!" He then shouted, letting his blade do the talking as it slammed against the ground, creating a wave of energy that sliced the spider into two pieces.

With a noisy, hiss-like cry, the creature then began to disintegrate, and Inuyasha had a moment to himself. He took the Tessaiga, and cut the thread around his legs, before getting back to his feet.

"Heh... That wasn't too hard..." He walked over, and picked up the two jewel shards. "And I got two shards out of it. Guess it was worth the scrap." Inuyasha swallowed the pieces, and immediately felt his body grow larger and thicker. His pecs got a little deeper, his biceps thicker, his abs harder, his legs wider, and his calves bigger. Inuyasha looked down his shirt in disappointment. "That it?" He asked no one specifically. "At this rate, I'm just gonna have to collect the entire jewel if I want any results!" He laughed confidently.
11112.title: Getting a Few Extra Shards In Before Dawn

choices: Go after Kouga, he wants power.
Go back to the camp first. It's too risky.
111121.content:
The half demon spent a full minute to admire himself. His shirt was getting tighter and tighter but hadn't given any signal that it would be shattered soon. He was concentrating the power into his upper body, making the pecs feel even more massive along with his hard six-pack. He rubbed his abs occasionally, giving his right hand a time to feel the hardness. The sensation rendered him in unimaginable sensation, and made him feel somewhat strong.

Inuyasha re-positioned his shirt to the most comfortable condition as possible after admiring himself a little, but finding it hard to due the bigger muscles inside. "Man, this is tight." He thought to himself while walking in discomfort. His thighs felt pressed together every time he moved his legs. The white haired demon growled in annoyance but kept walking anyway, until he heard a sudden voice behind him.

"Hold it right there!" In instant, Inuyasha turned his body, getting into his fighting stance.

Coming to his surprise, the voice was coming from a familiar figure, Kagura. What an unexpected visitor!

"What are you doing here?" He spat with cocky tone formed in his voice.

"Relax, I'm here not to fight you." Silence masked them for few seconds. "Your body." The wind witch said as she pointed a finger directing into Inuyasha's new developed body.

"Yeah, what is it?" The dog boy seemed impatient with her twisted talk.

"Seems you have found out, huh?" She answered with a sigh, then opened her fan in a steady position as Inuyasha walked closer. "Hey, I'm here not to fight you! Listen, I'm here only to give you information, and by looking at you, I guess you already know what will happen if you consume those pieces of shards."

"And then?"

"Judging from your new look, there's no doubt you want more." She explained carefully with her low tone, but that was only making the man in front of her losing his temper.

"So what is it then?!" The teen shouted at her, giving her a stern look.

"Hey easy!" She said, before looking off to the side. "Well.. I need your help to defeat Naraku. You're not the only one who know how to use these shard's power!" Kagura finally made her point. She said it directly, totally ignoring her calmness before.

That statement came as a jolt to Inuyasha's mind, his eyes grew larger just by imagining how many shards Naraku had, and definitely it wasn't a good thing for him.

"So you understand now? He's stronger than you, and the point is I want my freedom back from him. So the only way is to defeat him, and that's will be your job." She began to speak rapidly, directly to the point. By the time Inuyasha almost argued with her statement, she continued. "I'll tell you something: you need to collect shards as many as possible in order to defeat him."

"I know that!" Inuyasha interrupted.

"I haven't finished, dog boy! Your friend, that wolf demon, has three of them." She said while folded her fan back down into her fabulous looking yukata.

Inuyasha just made an underestimating sigh tone instead of thanking her. "And what should I do if Kouga has already consumed the shards?"

"Simple, beat him. The shards will expell from his body if he's beaten, or at least unconscious. That's the time you should grab those shards." The witch gave him a stern look, hoping that Inuyasha would believe her. She was his enemy after all.

"I'm wasting my time too much here... Farewell, dog boy!" With her accustomed move, she made a mount from her feather, then flew high into the sky. The wind blew so hard that Inuyasha had to move his right arm to cover his eyes.

"Damn that witch!" He cursed under his breath. The half demon spent a good thirty minutes to think about it, then he made his mind and decision.
111121.title: A Risky Offer

choices: Inuyasha returns the shards to Kouga, and suggests working together.
Inuyasha gulps the shards. Who needs that mangy wolf!?
1111211.content:
Inuyasha knew that at this point, Naraku would be too strong for him. He needed power first, and what better way then beating the snot out of some punk wolf demon?

Inuyahsa began on his way, trying to track Kouga down. It was a little difficult at first, but as soon as Inuyasha had found a scent, he quickly began to track it down.

After a few minutes of following the wolf's stank, he soon happened upon him. Inuyasha chose to remain behind the bushes for the time being as he watched the man.

"Hey! Who's that!" Kouga suddenly shouted. Inuyasha felt a chill travel up his spine. Was he spotted? He was being so quiet...

"Oh... Nevermind... It's just you babies." Kouga said adoringly, as he flexed his two powerful biceps. They were easily five inches thicker than Inuyasha's arms. Inuyasha gulped. Could he really do this? His insecurity was instantly shaken off. Of course he could do this! No muscle headed dog was going to beat him!

He emerged from the bushes. "Kouga!" He shouted, pointing his finger, "Come and face me, you stupid wolf! I'm gonna kick your ass and take those jewel shards!" He then unsheated Tetsuaiga, and rose it to Kouga.

Kouga laughed it off, before standing to his full height. He wasn't a giant, but he was far taller than Inuyasha. "What's that? Are you offering me a toothpick?" He said, still laughing.

"Shut the hell up! I'll cleave those shards out of your stomach myself!" He said, before charging right at Kouga. "Wind Scar!"

Kouga raised his hands, and clamped them onto the wave of energy. He grunted, thinking he was powerful enough to stop it. After a moment, it finally broke, but not without leaving Kouga quite worn. The sweat beading down his muscular body was apparant, and he was trying to hide his panting.

Inuyasha grinned. He knew he had the upper hand. "Wind Scar!" He unleashed another wave at Kouga. Kouga wasn't a total idiot. He dashed out of the way of this one, and felt safe for a moment. As soon as he looked up, he saw Inuyasha coming down from above, ready to slash! Kouga had no time to react!

At the last second, Inyasha turned the sword on it's side, slamming the flat, blunt end down on Kouga's head. The large, heavy fang rendered Kouga unconscious, and the large man fell on his side, zonked out.

There was a shine from his abs, as the jewel shards emerged from his stomach painlessly, without having to cut him open. Inuyasha gripped them tight in his hand.

Just as he was about to swallow them, he looked down at Kouga. He then thought of what Kagura had told him, and what Naraku plans were.

Inuyasha could always use an ally... But then again, Kouga could just as easily end up getting in his way...
1111211.title: Defeating the Alpha Male

choices: Demons begin to atack! And they have jewel shards!
It was Miroku and Shippou! What are they doing here...?
11112111.content:
Inuyasha looked briefly at Kouga. He just groaned to himself. The wolf was weak, but Naraku was strong. Far stronger than Inuyasha at this point.

------- About an hour later... --------

"Ugh... Man..." Kouga rubbed his head as he slowly sat back up. The last he remembered was Inuyasha, who hit him on the head, and rendered him unconscious. His attention then turned to his body. His armor felt really loose, which brought a frown to his face. To think, it seemed like just moments ago, the armor was filled with massive, bulging muscle. "Damn that mutt!" Kouga growled.

"Hey!" A voice shouted back. Kouga looked around a bit, until he spotted Inuyasha sitting under a nearby tree. Kouga grit his teeth. He was less than pleased to see his rival just sitting there so smug.

"What the hell do YOU want?" Kouga asked, baring his fangs.

"Shaddup! I'll tell you when I'm good and ready!" Inuyasha barked. He walked over, standing high above Kouga, his body far superior to the tiny little wolf's. Inuyasha liked this feeling of having dominion over the smaller male. One might even say it was... Arousing?

Kouga on the other hand, was hating it. HE was the alpha male around here, not some half-breed mutt! There was no way he was going to stand for this! ... If he could get up, that is. Inuyasha seemed to have quite a scare over the wolf demon.

"Here's the deal, idiot! Naraku is getting more powerful by the second, and I need YOUR ass to help me beat him!" Inuyasha instructed. "I'm gonna give you a couple of jewel shards back, but you work for me! You got that!?"

Kouga just growled at the larger male. "Why in the HELL would I EVER want to work under you!?" Kouga barked. Inuyasha flexed his large bicep, and puffed out his pumped pecs.

"Because I'm bigger than you, and I could just crush you like the bug you are!" He answered. Kouga just gulped. He looked down at Inuyasha's feet. The big hanyou wiggled his toes, making the ground shake ever so slightly, and showing Kouga how powerful he was.

"F... Fine." Kouga finally said, looking away.

"Good..." Inuyasha replied, dropping a few jewel shards down onto Kouga's lap. Kouga looked at them with surprise.

"H-Hey! This is less than what I started out with!" Kouga shouted.

"What, you think I was gonna give you ALL of those? Hell no! Then you'd be bigger than me! So I took a few!" Inuyasha then grinned, rubbing his tight eight-pack abs.

Kouga just snuffed. Whatever. He could gather more shards easily for himself, and overpower that damn dog if he wanted to. He swallowed them, and gained some of his former size back, but not nearly as much as he had before. He then stood to his feet, now having to look UP at Inuyasha. "I'm not gonna like you!" Kouga then said suddenly.

"I never said you had to, you stupid wolf!" Inuyasha snapped back, "After all this crap is over, I'm going right back to treating you like the worthless trash you are!"

"I'M trash?" Kouga scoffed arrogantly. "YOU'RE the one who turns back into a human every new moon, you half-breed mutt!"

"You little...!" Inuyasha began, but before he could finish, he was interrupted by...
11112111.title: Together!?

choices: Oh no! Inuyasha saw the shards!
Kouga managed to hide the shards in time, and sets off with Inuyasha.
111121111.content:
There was a noisy rustle, and just as the boys had adjusted their view, the saw a horde of demons, ravenous and wild, charging right for them!

"Alright! Now Kouga--" Inuyasha began, before looking down at where the wolf was. It was then he noticed that Kouga wasn't even at his side anymore! The ambitious man was already charging into the gang, and started shredding through them. "HEY!" Inuyasha shouted, running after Kouga, and into the fray.

It was hack and slash. All the demons reeked of blood, and splitting them open didn't help the two canine boy's noses.

"God! These things stink more than you do, mutt!" Kouga shouted, taking out another beast with a violent kick.

"Just shut up and fight! Unless you want to end up like the rest of these monsters!" Inuyasha barked back. Normally Kouga would shrug it off, but the fact that Inuyasha was really this huge actually sent a shock of doubt in his heart.

Wave after wave, the demons kept coming, before it ended abruptly.

"Heh, is that it!?" Inuyasha said with a cocky smirk, looking back where the first batch of demons had emerged.

"C'mon! Bring it on!" Kouga shouted out, "I'm not even tired yet!"

Despite the two teen's taunts, nothing more emerged from the forest. Inuyasha beat his chest with a single fist proudly.

"Looks like those grunts were nothing for the new and improved Inuyasha!" He grinned, turning around, and starting to walk off.

As Inuyasha walked off proudly, Kouga was quickly scanning through the corpses for and jewel shards. He had to be fast, and he had to be quiet, lest Inuyasha spot him, or worse, took and shards that Kouga might have found!

"Get a move on, wolf!" Inuyasha called back.

Kouga, too focused on searching to hear, kept on looking through the remains of the creatures. Suddenly, he saw a twinkle! With lightning speed, he snatched up whatever it was. As he opened his palm, he saw a total of three shards! All for himself!

Then...
111121111.title: First Fight

choices: Swallowed the jewel fragments for himself! More power and growth!
Split up the jewels for both him and Kouga to have...
1111211111.content:
Inuyasha stared at the shards, but put back behind several issues, he allowed Kouga slide them into his arm gauntlets as planned. ‘For a supposed alliance he sure was quick to not show me those shards... He's probably try to make himself more powerful then me and probably try to humiliate me and beat on me like I did him!’ His face balled up into a scowl as he began to approach the wolf.

Kouga for his part thought himself quite slick ‘I knew that mutt would let his guard down, Who would figure this partnership would be so sweet!’ He thought smiling slightly to himself until he saw Inuyasha stomping down towards him. “Yeah dog bre-Inuyasha?” He asked softly, changing his tone as he noticed the dark scowl on the larger demon’s face.

“You were planning to betray me in the first fucking day of this alliance?” He growled as he hefted the wolf demon up by the throat and held him several feet off the ground. The murderous intent around Inuyasha was a sight to behold, and even for a hardened demon like Kouga, it was both frightening and slightly arousing... Perhaps he would not mind being the whipping boy of such a powerful master.

“I-- Erm...” The smaller lupine man choked out. He could not believe he was actually this scared of that damn dog! He had stuttered!

Inuyasha smelt the fear just pooling off of him, and yet he also noted the rather ample bulge in the wolf demon’s arm bracer. “I saw the jewel shards” He answered almost silently, which to Kouga was even scarier then when he was screaming!

“You really plan to hide any we get? You think I would be that stupid not to scan the corpses? You found some and yet instead of telling me so we could split them you took them for yourself!” He acused violently, his hand shaking as he held the teen, his grip tightening.

Kouga realized that Inuyasha at this point could snap his neck like a twig if he wanted... As much as he hated submitting to the half breed, he knew he must.

“You can have them...” He gasped, his pride destroyed almost completely as he submitted himself to the superior beast.

Inuyasha violently tossed the wolf man to the ground. He was surprised and taken aback by the forwardness of the offering, and loved the way Kouga had swallowed his pride there, but he was still pissed.

The wolf feebly dug underneath his arm gauntlet and removed the three shards and placed them in front of the approaching Inuyasha.

“I-I am sorry InuYasha...I guess my nature got the better of me...” He spoke softly like each word was painful for him to speak.

Inuyasha just huffed and picked up the three shards, before then glaring down at the pitiful wolf, who was staring at the dirty ground and then up Inuyasha in equal measures.

Inuyasha then...
1111211111.title: Damn, and I Thought Dogs Had Bad Eyesight!

choices: Kouga gets the nerve to apologize to Inuyasha.
Kouga is too prideful to apologize! Nothing changes, until later that night...
11112111111.content:
Inuyasha opened wide, and to Kouga's dismay, swallowed every shard. A little lump traveled down his throat, and into his stomach.

As Inuyasha let out a smirk down at the little wolf, his body inched higher, as his muscles bulged out a little thicker. He licked his lips, and then walked over to Kouga. Bending over, so they were face-to-face, Inuyasha purposefully let out a triumphant burp.

Kouga pulled back immediately, fanning his nose. "Ew, you sick mutt!" He groaned, "You're disgusting!"

"And you're worthless liar." Inuyasha snapped back coldly. It hurt Kouga a little, but also fueled his fire a little as well. Just as he was about to say something back, he had a moment to take in just how much smaller he was than Inuyasha now. The giant half breed could probably crush Kouga's ribs under his foot if he wanted! Kouga's mind continued to wander, starting to develop somewhat of a fear for Inuyasha. At the same time, that very fear was causing him to have a bit of admiration for Inuyasha... Almost like an attraction, if you will.

Inuyasha had stood back up to his full height, dusting off his hands. "Well, that's done." He said to no one in particular. He may have gained more power, but now he wasn't very trusting of Kouga. He snatched Kouga up by the back of his neck. "Come on, you pathetic wolf." He said, "We have to take down Naraku, and any damned thing that stands in my way!"

Kouga wasn't stupid. He had a fairly good feeling that he was included in that "anything." It made him gulp in fear, as Inuyasha dragged him along.

---------------------

Soon enough, things were getting late. Now that Kouga was his new partner, he remained with him rather than the ones he used to call friends. "Alright, you little runt..." Inuyasha said, "You're going to go get firewood." Inuyasha then wandered over and under a shady tree. "I'm going to wait here while you do it!"

"Hey! How is that fair!?" Kouga barked. Inuyasha figured this was going to happen, but he had a plan. His large foot soon shoved itself in Kouga's face, practically covering it! Kouga could smell the earth scent on Inuyasha's foot.

"Listen here, you two faced wolf! First off, you owe me, and second, if you don't, I'm gonna pound you, got it!?" Inuyasha snarled at Kouga. Kouga, yet again, was frightened, but he wouldn't let it show through.

Later in the evening, the two were gathered around the fire. They were roasting up some of the less disgusting demons that they had defeated earlier. Neither of them really spoke much to each other. Inuyasha was doing his best to cook properly, Kouga merely watching, glancing at the food, and at Inuyasha from time to time.
11112111111.title: The Strong Get Stronger

choices: Saw Kouga's hesitation, and decided to try to make a move on it.
Inuyasha simply repeated what he said.
111121111112.content:
“Damn mutt...” Kouga kept muttering under his breath, as he gouged the ground out with his sharp nails, as he often did when he was angry. The fire was down to smoldering embers, as the two canine teens laid out under the starry skies.

Inuyasha could tell by the dirty looks Kouga kept sending his way every now and again that he was not happy with his decision to consume all the jewel shards for himself. Inuyasha brushed this off quite quickly; the wolf had betrayed their alliance, so Inuyashs had just acted accordingly. He would have to test to see if Kouga could be trusted in the future; to see if he could handle more than small amount of jewels shards within his body.

Kouga, for his part, was completely blaming Inuyasha for today’s action. ‘Damn mutt, those were my jewel shards! Now I'm stuck at this pitiful size, as he just gets bigger and stronger... and sexier...’ His face flushed a bright hot pink at that thought that had unwillingly rushed through his mind. He quickly tried to shove that thought as far down in his mind as possible.

Inuyasha was watching his partner carefully for any further actions. Who knew what other treason he could be planning! However, the half breed was suddenly taken aback by the sight of Kouga's massive blush. The dog demon snorted in annoyance as he tried to imagine what it could be to cause such a hardened demon to openly show such a weak, human reaction. ‘Feh, the stupid wolf is probably realizing what a stupid mistake he made... He was an idiot to betray an unstoppable force like me, and he's probably just now realizing it!’

The dog demon brushed it off and pushed his formidable bulk back up against a tree. Inuyasha continued to openly stare at his new, untrustworthy partner. “About time to get some sleep, eh?” He said after a little time had passed, his tone indifferent. For his part, he was more then ready to call it a night, despite his increased reserves of energy from both the jewels and his new body. However, he was a little worn down from all the fighting this day had brought on.

It took a moment for Kouga to even notice that Inuyasha was speaking to him. He was staring at the large beast, and all he could focus on were those two soft looking lips sliding and rubbing against each other as the big guy spoke. He fought back a mild groan, pleading with himself not to get a erection at the sight of the mutt.

“Wha? Sorry?” He said after a moment, his voice a bit meek as he snapped to. He had hoped Inuyasha wouldn't notice...

Inuyasha then...
111121111112.title: Possibilities

choices: Inuyasha then began to kiss Kouga!
Inuyasha just grinned. It had all been a game to him
1111211111121.content:
Kouga frowned in confusion when Inuyasha hadn't repeated what he had said. Inuyasha just continued to stare at the wolf with a slightly firm look on his face. Kouga had to fight back another lust, he had just noticed how beautiful the half demon's face was when he seemed angry. Now he was struggling against his own primal instinct, to which at this point, it was just a losing battle. He let out a muffled groan as he felt his slit begin to ooze pre, starting to really got aroused!

Inuyasha of course picked up on the groan and he noticed just how Kouga was holding himself. He was amazed, and started running his hands all over his body, unable to believe it was really his body he was feeling! It was amazing!

Gently, he reached down and used a sharp nail to cut the string that was holding his armor down. It released with a satisfying "pop!" and Kouga was then able to take a big breath. The armor had been holding him down pretty tight! He was relieved to have that burden off his chest. He looked down and laughed a little, giving his pecs a satisfying flex.

"Damn... I thought I was hot before, but now look at me!" He said confidently, flexing both of his arms proudly. "Heh, wait until the rest of the pack gets a look at these pythons!"

His calves welled up with new size, becoming two pillars of power, which was followed by his feet which grew wide and thick, nearly completing the beast's body.

As if icing on the cake, Kouga looked down, watching his bulge grow longer and thicker. This just made him laugh in joy. "Ha! Now no man can compare to me!" He chuckled, watching as it came just short of being longer than his kilt. "Damn... Any longer and I'd have to get new clothes! Not like I'd want to hide this godly physique!" "Master Kouga!" A voice called. Kouga turned around and saw the two loyal members of his pack, Ginta and Hakkaku.

"Oh, hey guys!" Kouga said, smiling a little. It was nice to see a familiar face. As he looked at them, he instantly noticed them looking at his fat, round gut.

"Uh... Kouga..." Hakkaku began, "You... Have you...?" He wasn't quite sure how to say what he wanted to, and the last thing he wanted to do was insult his pack leader.

Kouga was a bit nervous at first, but gave his stomach a firm slap. "Y-Yeah!" He answered, going along with it. "I figured I needed more stamina, and what better way than to gather it up than a hearty meal? I think I might have overdone it though, ehehehe..." He stammered nervously.

Ginta and Hakkaku looked at each other for a moment, before nodding. "Right." They said in unison. There was then an awkward silence, all three just looking around idly, not sure what to say yet.

"So..." Hakkaku began, "Did... You want us to help?"

"Huh?" Kouga asked, unsure what he meant.

"You know... Help you get... Bigger?" Hakkaku clarified. "You did want to, right? You know Ginta and I would be willing to help you..."

Kouga was a bit surprised at first, not sure how to respond to the lesser male's offer. If he refused, it would make him look suspicious for sure! On the other hand, if he took up the offer, this little Buddha belly wasn't going to be the only weight he would be putting on! He had no choice at this point...

"Uh, sure!" Kouga agreed, a little nervous. The two men's faces lit up with joy. They were happy to be able to help Kouga out with his endeavors. They both took one of Kouga's wrists, and started to pull at him.

"Let's get going then!" Ginta said excitedly.

"We have a lot of work to do!" Hakkaku added.

-------------------------------

"We'll make sure you get fed a lot!" Ginta said.

Kouga was soon allowed to stop eating once nightfall rolled around. He sighed, rubbing his swollen gut. Never had he been forced to eat so much food in his life! It's something he never wanted to repeat again!

As the moon lifted high into the sky, the tribe was preparing to rest in their base behind the waterfall.

"You better get your sleep if you wanna bulk up!" Hakkaku said, smiling at Kouga. Gint was setting up Kouga's bed for him, getting it warm and comfy for their leader. It took a good while. Some members didn't fall asleep for a whole hour, while others were out in a matter of seconds! But once Kouga was sure the coast was clear, he made his way out passing through the waterfall with one little burst of agility. He was out and free to start working off this huge belly he had acquired.

Kouga started with what he was best at. A sprint. As soon as he could, he made a run for it, giving his legs an adaquate workout, while also getting him away from the base. Once far enough, Kouga started to work out, lifting various rocks and branches, and even trying to do a few sit ups while he was at it! It would take time, but he knew that soon enough he'd have this huge weight lifted from him.

Harder and harder Kouga worked, tiring out and taking short, ten minute breaks, before pressing his nose to the grind once more. His body was covered in sweat, as he had quickly realized how much harder it was to work! He swore, after this, he'd never laugh at an overweight person again.

133.content:
The twister surrounding Kouga soon dissipated as he continued running; what the weird man had said really bothered him… change forever? The young wolf demon slowly stopped in his tracks, vaguely aware of his surroundings. At the moment, all he cared about was if… what if, the man was being serious? He didn’t sound very bright, but still, Kouga had this weird feeling, like something was off. Soon, his paranoia became too overwhelming to ignore. He quickly looked his body over, from his chest to his feet, keeping an eye open for any abnormalities or changes. From what he could see, his body was as perfect as usual! His slightly tanned skin, his small but horribly powerful muscles, and his strong hands and feet; everything was normal.

“Damn, I’m such an idiot…” He muttered, tugging on his fur and armour, both feeling a bit tight for some reason. “I can’t believe I let myself get worried about what that…mental man said! So stupid, seriously. I think seeing that mutt so often’s making me dumber! Well, whatever, my Kagome’s worth it~”

With that, Kouga began running again, going faster and faster until his usual twister formed. Before he could go very far though, a loud TEAARRRRR sound surprised him, and with a sudden SNAP, he lost his footing, tripped, and went flying into a tree, which, was knocked down in the process.

Kouga pushed a few pieces of wood off of himself, sitting up as the sudden dust in the air slowly cleared. “Ughhh… *cough* That – REALLY – HURT! The hell?!” He yelled, attempting to stand up, a strong, tingling feeling going through his body
.
Still disoriented, but now standing, Kouga looked down at his feet. He was dumbfounded when he realized that the usual straps around them had ripped and snapped off, now in tatters. The material between his toes had rubbed and pushed into his skin until it couldn’t take the strain all of a sudden, making it horribly painful to run, which was why he had tripped. They had also ripped at the ankles, resulting in the tattered mess a few feet away. The upper part of his fur ‘boots’ had stayed on, but hugged his lower calves WAY too tightly. His confusion did not fade, as did the slight tingling sensation still going through his body. Kouga then realized, after shaking off the disorientation that the fall had caused, that… he was shirtless?! Every inch of his well-toned, muscular upper body was glistening in the partial sun under the tree. His pecs seemed to be pushing outwards more than usual, while his wash-board six pack seemed to be developing into an eight pack! Looking around, walking from tree to tree, the unknowingly taller wolf demon found his fur upper wear and armour under a tree, and both had a huge tear running down the back.

“What the hell? Cheap crap…” Kouga muttered, bending down to get a better look, his hands on his knees. “Well, I HAVE been wearing them for a long time – WAY too long, I guess,” Kouga whispered to himself, noticing the faint but obvious smell coming from his clothes, sighing. “Well, whatever! They were worn out anyways! I’ll just leave it alone… I kinda like being shirtless anyways~ And I’m used to being barefoot too, so I’m good!” Kouga laughed, slightly bouncing his pecs and wiggling his bigger toes as he admired himself.

Deciding he was fine, Kouga stood up, only for his head to hit a large branch REALLY hard, the branch breaking.

“GOD DAMMIT! THIS – is getting REALLLLLY annoying! SERIOUSLY!” Kouga growled, rubbing his head as a few wood chips fell out of his hair. “Something is DEFIN… etly… wrong?”

Kouga immediately stopped talking, utterly confused, though somewhat intrigued by the fact that, for some reason… he was surrounded by leaves! He looked down, not in the mood to pay attention to his massive, towering body, and saw that everything above his pecs were in the trees. Kouga blushed hard, turning his head as he noticed that his huge manhood was hanging out of his REALLY tight fur undergarments. Trying to ignore that, he finally pieced what was actually PREEEEETTY obvious together. All the clothes, and the ‘shoes’ that he had been wearing ripped… because they were too small! As a matter of fact, EVERYTHING seemed smaller! Even his loincloth, failing to hide his pride and joy, was ripping and tearing against his thicker thighs. As Kouga watched the tears grow larger, and felt his hair tie snap off, he realized… he was getting bigger! Kouga took a small step forward with his massive, growing foot, the tremors it sent through the forest scaring a few birds away.

“N-No way…” Kouga pushed a few branches and leaves out of his way, making it back to his original path, his behemoth sized, bare feet leaving two foot long footprints in the dirt. “I’m… I’m… Gigantic! I’m freaking HUGE!” He yelled, his loincloth completely shredding off as he swelled past the height of ten feet tall. “Hehehe… well, I guess I got nothing to hide anyways~” Kouga announced, not even minding a bit that he was stark naked. “But still, how? This is just too frea- WAIT! No way…”

A twister formed around Kouga’s body as he began running, his body this time demolishing anything in his way, including a few small trees. It was that weird, messed up man who said he would change… He was sure it had been the springs! He could swear he was even still getting bigger… Though, little did Kouga know, because of the cursed spring, he’d NEVER stop growing!

Kouga smirked as he made his way too…
133.title: Some 'Curse!'

choices: Kouga awakens... To see a HUGE Inuyasha!
Kouga awoke to see Ginta and Hakkaku!
134.content:
As Kouga was fleeing the cursed springs, he didn't even take a moment to notice his surroundings.

About an hour later, he stopped for a break, near what appeared to be an ocean's edge. He walked over, and took a dip in the water.

"Whew! Man, that was some run..." He said to himself. As he shook off the water, he took a look around. "Where am I...? I don't remember seeing any of this on the way here... Well, no problem! A big-shot wolf like me won't have any problem returning home!"

After his short break, and a little self-encouragement, Kouga was back on the road, heading back to meet up with his tribe. After yet another hour, he stopped for another break, this time in the middle of a clearing in the forest.

"Damn!" Kouga groaned, wiping his forehead, "I should have easily been there by now!" He looked about at his surroundings. "Man, am I in some kind of gigantic forest or something...!?" He said, looking all around. He started walking, taking his time this time to try to figure out just where the heck he was!

Everything looked so big! "Must be something in the water or rain..." Kouga thought idly to himself as he continued through the green labyrinth.

Just then, Kouga saw something that REALLY sent a shiver up his spine. A gargantuan cicada, at least 3 feet tall, was crawling right along the ground in front of him.

"Whoa whoa! How the hell did that thing get so frickin' huge!?" He said to himself, pulling back, away from the beast. Eventually, it merely flew off on it's own, doing no one any harm. "Okay... Now I KNOW there's something freaky going on..." He told himself.

Just then, there was a loud stomp! It nearly made Kouga jump out of his skin! Without even looking back, Kouga sprinted off, not wanting to know what made such a powerful, earth-shaking stomp!

As the wolf man continued to flee, the stomps didn't seem to end, and no matter how fast he ran, he couldn't escape! Not to mention he had yet to recover from his earlier fatigue. After a few mere minutes, Kouga fell forward, completely worn out.

"Hey! Look!" A man said, who then picked Kouga up.
134.title: Pocket Wolfie!

choices: In a secluded spot to have fun with Kouga!
Back at the Cursed Springs!
But suddenly, Kouga feels strange...
1341.content:
Koga groaned, rubbing his head as he finally came to. Everything below his chest felt really warm... And he could hear the fresh, green grass rustling softly.

"I really wore myself out that time..." He said softly to himself. He looked about. His hands fell down on something soft. Immediately, he looked down to see his entire body enveloped in some warm, soft crevass! "What the heck is this!?" He said, banging his fists down on it.

"Oh! You're awake!" A voice said. Kouga felt a sudden force moving the crevass. It was at this time he realized it wasn't a crevass, but a hand! How in the heck could he fit into a hand!? Kouga looked up, and saw something that sent chills down his spine. The silver hair, the dog ears, those yellow eyes... It was Inuyasha! But how did that mutt get so huge!?

"It's about time!" Inuyasha said, holding Kouga to his face. "I've been waiting for you to wake up all day!"

"How the hell did you get so huge, you mutt!?" Kouga barked back.

Inuyasha just raised his eyebrow to Kouga. "Huge? What the heck are you talking about?" Inuyasha gave the wolf demon a little squeeze to show him his place. "I'm not huge! You're just shrunk!"

Upon hearing that, Kouga's eyes widened. He started looking around frantically. Everything WASN'T huge, like he thought! He was tiny! A pipsqueak! He must have only been about five inches tall! It explained everything... Ever since he fell into that water...

"Damn it Inuyasha! Let me go!" Kouga insisted as they continued to walk onward.

"No way! You were always annoying, so now I'm gonna make you my new toy!" Inuyasha said with a grin. As the normal-sized half dog demon was walking onward, he soon was...
1341.title: A Dog's Dog

choices: Inuyasha was starting to get hungry...
Inuyasha makes Kouga worship another part of his body!
13411.content:
Inuyasha plopped down with his back against a tree. He grinned down at the tiny Kouga.

"Alright, you stupid wolf, you can start serving me by rubbing my feet!" He said, setting Kouga down. Instantly, the wolf tried to run from Inuyasha. It wasn't going to be that easy! Inuyasha lunged forward, and pounced down on top of the tiny Kouga, pinning him down to the cold, hard ground. "Hey! Don't you even dare try to escape!" Inuyasha applied pressure onto Kouga's tiny body, making him cry out in pain. Inuyasha just grinned. He loved the way Kouga wailed. But he at least knew that too much pressure could end up killing the little toy.

Inuyasha released Kouga, and picked him up by the scruff of his neck. Inuyasha laid back up against the tree, and set Kouga at his feet.

"Now, get to work! And don't try running again, or I'll make sure you end up dead next time!" Inuyasha barked. Kouga shuddered a little. Before, Inuyasha was no big deal, but now that he was practically a giant compared to him, Kouga was walking on eggshells here.

Slowly, Kouga pressed his hands to Inuyasha's giant foot. It was warm, but practically hard as a rock! How could that mutt even feel anything with feet this hard?!

"I don't feel any rubbing down there!" Inuyasha said, shoving the foot into Kouga's body. Almost immediately after, Kouga began to rub the foot. He could feel every contour of the large appendage, not to mention the faint musk the emnated from it. "Ahhh, yeah..." Inuyasha sighed. He had never had someone rub his feet for him before. He was liking how this felt! His wide toes flexed and relaxed, making a slight crack as they did.

Kouga had a scowl on his face as he worked. He really didn't like that he was forced into slavery to this giant, worthless half-breed, but there wasn't anything he could do to fight back at this point.

As Kouga massaged, the foot suddently came down, and pressed on him. Inuyasha laughed to himself, loving how powerful he felt when he had dominion over such a lesser being. Just one foot alone was enough to cover Kouga's entire body. He pressed down a little, rubbing Kouga against the rough, musky flesh.

"Like that, wolf boy?" Inuyasha said with a cocky smirk. Kouga could only grunt in reply, which was muffled by Inuyasha's foot. This only made Inuyasha laugh even more. He lifted his foot from Kouga, and picked the mini-sized wolf up once more.
13411.title: Breaking in the New Pet

134111.content:
Before Inuyasha could speak again, a loud growl came from his stomach. Kouga became very nervous the moment that sound breached his ears. Inuyasha looked down, rubbing his stomach.

"Geez, hungry already? I already had breakfast..." He grumbled to himself. He then looked at Kouga. "Heh... Someone's looking like they'd make a tasty snack!" Inuyasha said with a dark grin.

"Wh-What!? No way! I-I taste horrible! I'm all tough and gamy!" Kouga said, starting to sweat.

"I never said you had to be tasty... You just gotta be filling!" He grinned, his hand slowly moving up to his mouth. Inuyasha was doing it on purpose. He could feel his taste buds tingle, his whole mouth beginning to fill with saliva. Kouga was slowly drawing closer to the mouth. He was pushing at Inuyasha's hand, giving his all trying to get loose, but the bigger dog just tightened his grip. As the mouth slowly opened, the drool flooded out, Inuyasha's chops moistened by the wetness. It looks like Kouga had a nice, warm pool eagerly awaiting his arrival.

Kouga was placed in, and held in place by Inuyasha's hand, as his only exit closed around the limb. The hand released him, holding him down to the tongue with just a few fingers. Slowly, the hand worked it's way out, and the teeth clamped shut! Kouga was sealed within with no hopes of escape!

Inuyasha swished the little wolf around in his mouth a little. "Mmmm... I dunno what you're talking about! You're delicious!" He said, as he then started to suck. He let out a sudden moan that was near deafening to Kouga, but felt so good to Inuyasha. "Aw, man! You're so delicious!" Inuyasha said, making sure to speak carefully so Kouga still had no means of escape. Kouga was suddenly thrown up, pushed by the tongue, and slammed into the roof of Inuyasha's mouth. He was slid around up there, as Inuyasha continued to take in the wolf demon's full flavor.

"S-Stop it, Inuyasha! I'm begging you!" Kouga shouted in a submissive tone. "You can't do this!"

Kouga's pleas were, of course, ignored, as Inuyasha merely kept toying with him, moving him all around, getting the wolf over every little inch of his tongue.

"Damn... You taste so good... So... So good..." He moaned. Every spot in his mouth that the wolf seemed to touch was like a spark of pure ecstasy jolting throughout his entire body, from his little dog ears to his toes.

Kouga got an idea. He quickly turned around, and bit Inuyasha's tongue! What a stupid idea it was, and idea that sealed his fate no less. Inuyasha then yelled out in pain, but in doing so, craned his neck backward, sliding Kouga down his throat.

"What!? N-No! Nooooo!" Kouga shouted, but his cries soon became muffled in the tight tunnel that was Inuyasha's gullet.

Meanwhile, Inuyasha touched his tongue. He wasn't bleeding, but the spot certainly was tender...

Kouga soon was worked all the way down, landing with a splash in Inuyasha's stomach! He dashed over to the stomach walls, and started to hit on them.

"No! Let me out!" He shouted desperately, as the liquid started to tingle.

Inuyasha just laid back up against the tree, rubbing his stomach idly. He let out a noisy burp feeling great about himself. "Haaaah... Not bad..." He snickered to himself. "Maybe I should get you some friends! Perhaps a little Shippou... Kirara... Hey! Maybe you can even have Kagome join you!" Inuyasha said, laughing at his own joke.

The half-breed demon just laid back enjoying the warm sun on his skin, sighing. What a perfect end to a perfect snack!

151.content:
Sota sighed as he walked home from school, kicking the occasional pebbles on the sidewalk. There hadn’t been much to do lately, besides just wait for his sister to come home, but of course, what he really wanted was for Inuyasha to come by, like he used to! Though, since Kagome was spending more and more time in the Feudal Era, and less time here, Inuyasha didn’t come very often, or stay for very long when he did!

“This just sucks…” He muttered, walking up to his front door.

But, to Sota’s surprise, as he opened the door and walked into the house, he spotted Inuyasha, screwing with Buyo like he usually did while waiting for Kagome. Sota smiled, yelling, “Hey Inuyasha!”

Inuyasha turned his head, still holding Buyo by his paws, simply replying, “Hey Sota!” He let go of the cat, grunting. “Could you tell Kagome to hurry up? I’ve been waiting here since this morning!”

“Yeah, I’ll go tell her!” Sota answered, already walking up the stairs.

As Sota reached Kagome’s door, he came to a sudden realization. When Kagome was ready, her AND Inuyasha were going to leave. The young boy was about to turn around, wanting to spend some time with Inuyasha downstairs, but his sister came booming through her door, in a slight rush.

Kagome turned her head as she ran down the stairs, yelling, “See you later Sota!”

“Ahhh… Already?” He whispered to himself, disappointed.

Sota began walking down the stairs, at least wanting to say goodbye to his sister and Inuyasha, but stopped right in his tracks when he saw a gleaming piece of… glass? He bent downwards and picked the small shard up, cleaning it off a little before placing it in his pocket.

“Grandpa must’ve broken one of his fake Shikon Jewels!” Sota said, as he reached the bottom of the stairs. “He’s so clumsy sometimes, seriously…”

Sota was sad to see, when he got downstairs, that his sister and Inuaysha were already gone! He sluggishly walked back up the stairs, feeling horribly disappointed as he walked into his room, kicking his shoes off, but leaving his socks on as he jumped onto his bed. He slightly stretched his muscles, and repositioned himself a few times, staring up at the ceiling. What was he going to do for the rest of the day? Sota’s thoughts were cut off as he scratched his leg where his pocket was, feeling a strong, tingly itch. Though, almost a few seconds later, the itching stopped, letting Sota think about what he would do next. He once again stretched and repositioned himself, feeling a little uncomfortable for some reason. Little did the young boy know, his body had absorbed an actual jewel shard, that Kagome had accidentally dropped.

“There isn't that much to do..." Sota muttered, still thinking.
151.title: Just A Kid

choices: Changes between then and now
1511.content:
It took only a few minutes of silent thinking before Souta felt bored out of his mind. He considered calling few friends to see if they wanted to do anything together. But the thought was quickly discarded when he remembered it was spring break, so they out of visiting relatives.

"I know! I'll go explore the woods out back!" It had been so since he went into the woods that covered the mountain range belonging to the Higurashi estate. In fact, the last time he could recall was when Inuyasha claimed his sword could make diamonds, of all things.

With a plan of action cemented in his mind, Souta hopped off his bed and headed down stairs to kitchen to fetch a couple snacks for his little expedition. There he found his mother working on what he only imagine to be that night's dinner.

"Mom, I'm going out into woods. Is there anything I take for a snack?" Souta asked as he rummaged through the refrigerator.

"There are few leftover onigiri that didn't make into your sister's backpack. Fell free to take as many as you want, they should be on the second shelf." The desired treats were right where he was told they would be.

Souta grabbed four before closing the fridge. He then retrieved his lunch box and a backpack to carry everything in. Finally, the boy made his way towards the exits, but not before asked to return home before dinner. It was curry, one of Kagome's favorite dishes, but with her suddenly being spirited away again, the rest of the family was going to have to work at trimming down the amount of leftovers. Souta was going to have to make his trip a swift one if he had any hopes of doing anything worthwhile while he was out. He slipped the shoes he had accidentally brought to his room back onto his feet. It was a slight, though, almost like the shoes had shrunk. Or maybe his feet were still swollen from when he last took the shoes off. The possibility that his feet had honestly grown bigger since early that morning, also crossed the boy's mind, but was written off as being as equally impossible the shoes shrinking. But to be on the safe side, he'd let his mom know that he needed a new pair when got back.
1511.title: He decides to go for a walk

choices: From the ground up

15111.content:
After wandering for about half a hour, Souta found himself at the site of Inuyasha's exhibition. The crevice created by the display of power looked just as bad now as it did a few month. At least now the canopy made by the surviving trees that lined the scarred earth hid it from at the mountain.

Souta enjoyed admiring the true strength that lay before. But admiration sometimes brought to the surface the few insecurities that he had, even for a boy his age. He was weak, short, and useless. The boy couldn't even the the doorway to the past deep within shrine's well. In his mind, he was a pathetic little brother, unable to help when to help his sis when it mattered.

"I'm glad you don't have a shrimp like me holding you back, sis" he said in defeat. "If I wish was bigger and could open that stupid gate. But who am I kidding, by the time i get big enough, there will be nothing left to help with." Souta pulled his lunchbox out, said a brief grace, and began chowing on his onigiri. He determined to grow quickly, and what better place to start than with the food had with him.

Not long after he ate last speck of rice he could find, Souta noticed how tight shoes felt now. Where as back at the home the tightness was like a slight squeeze, he felt like his feet were being crushed. The boy looked to his shoes and saw how much they were bulging, threatening to burst at any given moment.

Souta work hastily to remove the ill fitting shoes and, in turn, relieve the unbearable pressure he was feeling. Whatever was going on certain wasn't ordinary by any means, but he would have to hold onto the thought as the sun had nearly sunken below the horizon. Running full burst the boy managed to make it home just as the last embers of day faded from the sky. And with even greater speed bounded up the stairs and straight into his room.

Once the door was shut soundly and locked for privacy, Souta examined his shoe. There was nothing wrong with it. It appeared the same as it had always been.
'I wonder.' There was no problem with either shoe, so maybe his own feet were to blame.

Souta sat down on his bed. He took one the shoes and lined the heel up with his foot suffice to say he was shocked at he was looking at. The shoe came nowhere near to matching the length of his foot reaching just below the ball. There was definitely something supernatural going on, but how? Why?

153.content:
"Put me down! Stoppit, Inuyasha!" Shippou cried, as Inuyasha was giving him yet another noogie.

"Say it, Shippou!" Inuyasha said with a grin, asserting his dominance over the smaller male. "Say uncle!"

"N-Noooooo!" Shippou said in defiance.

"Inuyasha!" A voice called in, "Sit, boy!" It then said. Within a matter of seconds, Inuyasha slammed into the ground as he always did. Little Shippou was free, and hopped over to the master's side.

"Ow, dammit Kagome, I was just having a little fun with the guy!" Inuyasha groaned as he got back to his feet.

"Picking on people smaller and weaker than you is by no means fun!" She said back, scolding the half-demon. Shippou, peeking out from behind Kagome's legs, stuck his tongue out.

"Yeah, yeah, I wouldn't expect a woman to get how real men bond." Inuyasha replied, brushing her words right off.

Kagome, shot-tempered in these situations, issued another "Sit!", thus slamming Inuyasha to the ground once more.

"Ow! What did I say!?" Inuyasha barked, although this time, Kagome merely walked away. Shippou, as well, had also wandered off.

--------------------------------------------

As the young fox boy sat in a tree, Kagome's words echoed through his head.

". . . Someone as smaller and weaker than you . . ."

". . . Smaller and weaker . . ."

". . . Small . . . Weak . . .


Shippou knew he was smaller and weaker than Inuyasha. He had no problem admitting that. However, when he thought about, it, he actualy WAS the smallest and weakest person in his group of friends. The only person smaller than him was Kirara, and even she could morph into something much larger, and far stronger than Shippou was. It started to bring the little fox boy down. All he could manage to think was how small and pathetic he was.

At this point, Shippou felt like he was a burden unto his friends. He hopped down sorrowfully from the tree, and started to wander off. As he did, there was a sudden trill from behind him. Shippou turned, and saw Kirara there, gazing at him with wide, questioning eyes.

"I'm just going for a walk, girl, okay?" Shippou said, walking over, and petting Kirara's head. She hopped along, following Shippou. "No! You have to stay here with the others!" Shippou insisted, gently nudging Kirara back to camp. She fought it for a bit, but then turned once more to Shippou. As she trilled again, she tilted her head, looking at Shippou. "Don't worry about me, okay?" He asked her, "I promise I'll come back okay!" He said, his former sadness becoming determination.

Shippou set out, walking far and wide. Things were kind of relaxing on his own. He felt strong and independent, as if no one could stop him. Of course, he didn't think about that too long, since it would depress him, since pretty much ANYONE could stop him.

Before he knew it, he was poking around the bottom of the mountains, enjoying a little exploring. As he did, he soon happened upon a hot spring.

"Wow! Lookit this!" He said rather loudly to himself, looking at the steam as it rose from the hot pool. "This is so cool!" Shippou inhaled the fumes from the pool, and instantly, he felt as if he could jump over the mountain! It was amazing... Just imagine how he'd feel if he actually bathed in it!

1533.content:
Shippou jumped back, surprised to see his foster brother and tormentor standing right before him.

"So this is where you've been, eh?" Inuyasha said, appearing as somewhat miffed.

"Wh-What? Whadd'ya mean?" Shippou said nervously, as if Inuyasha had caught him doing some kind of dirty act.

Inuyasha plucked Shippou up. Normally he would've questioned Shippou further, but he noticed something seemed kind of off. "You're acting pretty strange..." He said to the boy.

"S-Strange? No sir! Not me!" Shippou replied, starting to sweat a little, either from the steam, or the tension of this situation.

Inuyasha continued to glare at the boy, and would've continued, if not for seeing the steam rising from nearby rocks. "Hey, what's that?" He asked. Shippou just gulped. Inuyasha walked over, and crouched down. "Huh... Looks like a hot spring..." He said, "Not bad, Shippou!" He held the fox boy up to his face, "Looks like you found us our own personal bath! Well, what are you waiting for!? Let's hop in!" The half-demon insisted. He let Shippou go, and started stripping down. First his kimono top, ditching it entirely, before sliding out of his white undershirt to reveal all the sexy, slender muscle underneath. There was a distinct pink blush across Shippou's face. He had always bathed around girls, and to see his older foster brother like this... Well, Shippou felt a little stirring, to say the least. Next was Inuyasha's kimono bottoms, to which he easily slipped off. Inuyasha then stood there, in nothing but a pair of white briefs that Kagome had given to him as a gift a little while back. Although, it barely hid his well-endowed self, the more Shippou tried to look away, the more he found himself staring.

Paying the little boy no mind, Inuyasha splashed right into the hot water, and laid against the side.

"Ahhhhhh... This feels great...." He sighed. "It's like I can feel all my muscles relaxing..." Inuyasha felt as if he was in his own little heaven. Even if Shippou was here, all the mattered right now was that he was keeping quiet and not making much noise.

While Inuyasha was relaxing, it was only Shippou who noticed something strange. Upon a closer obsevation...
1533.title: What!? How!?

As Inuyasha laid out, his body was slowly expanding, inching upward as he laid out in the hot pool. Shippou thought was seeing things, so he rubbed his eyes. Just after doing so, the steam was too much for him. He turned around, and sat, rubbing his eyes more furiously. Inuyasha remained entirely oblivious for the time being, not even knowing that he the pool he sat in was growing smaller and smaller around his body.

After a moment, Shippou turned around and looked at Inuyasha... Only to see he was looking at his back! Slowly, he started to look up. He saw a huge Inuyasha, who was idly enjoying the pool. He fell onto his back. his mouth gaping.

"Wow, Shippou, you should really give this a try..." Inuyasha sighed, feeling relaxed. Shippou. smiling since he saw that Inuyasha was totally unaware. Stripping down, he ran over, and hopped right into the hot pool. re-emerging with a big smile on his face. He looked up at Inuyasha. Hopefully he could get that big too!

After a mere matter of moments, Shippou just kept looking up. Inuyasha kept getting bigger, but Shippou was staying the same.

choices: "Holy Crap! Shippou, you look... smaller!"

153311.content:
Shippou simply floated in the hot spring for a while, hoping for the best. He looked up to Inuyasha, watching as the young half demon continued to slowly swell larger, his blissful smile partially hidden behind his huge, expanding pecs. Shippou’s feeling of excitement slowly faded, as he realized that, even though Inuyasha was still growing in the hot spring, he hadn’t grown AT ALL.

Shippou flinched as Inuyasha attempted to reposition himself in the water, his lower abs slowly beginning to poke out of the hot spring. “Ugh… Damn it Kagome…” Inuyasha muttered. “These… Uh… boxers are WAY too tight…”

Inuyasha shivered slightly as a light breeze blew against his upper body, which he thought was unusual. Attempting to ignore it, he just continued to relax. He didn’t encounter awesome hot springs like this very often, so he was going to take real advantage of it! And luckily for Shippou, the boxers Kagome had given Inuyasha would be able to hold his massive junk for a while.

Shippou, rubbing his eyes, hoped he was dreaming. But, he slowly stopped doing so, right in time to see Inuyasha as big as ever. He looked down, avoided the sight of the massive, hot half demon, to only see one of Inuyasha’s massive, slowly expanding feet under the water. Then a foot appeared. It was large, heave, and had familiar claws. The powerful muscular leg that followed was bare. As the hips appeared, they could see the tattered remains of some clothing that had ripped around the groin, leaving a large genital hanging free in the air.

The torso was sculpted. Every bit of muscle seemed too perfect to be real. The chest jutted out with perfect and strong muscles. Those alone looked like they could crush boulders. The arm appeared with such sculpted muscles Kagome was sure it was a dream or something she ate. Especially as she recognized the necklace this being was wearing. It seemed to be the only thing left on his massive form.

"Inuyasha, they didn't shrink. You grew! You're gigantic!" Kagome yelled.

Cursed areas are a tricky problem. They can either be to one's benefit and other times they can bring great misfortune. The waters before the muscular Inuyasha, curse-free Miroku, wolf demon Kouga, youthful Shippo, concerned Sango, and wise Kagome were just like that. When one who bathes in these mystical water wishes to protect the power will flow into himself and enhance himself the more he wants to protect.

Conversely, a selfish user, one who seeks to empower for their own sake, their own domination and do not consider others, will not be empowered in the same way. Few who were cursed tended to live, so what became of them was a true mystery.

So when Shippo saw the mystical water just heal an curse with what originally had just one escape clause he was angry. Why Miroku and not him? Why Inuyasha and not him? What did he have to to get that power? Drink it? Shippo's eyes widened as a sly smile appeared on his face as Miroku was distracting the others with his cured hand. The speedy wolf-demon tracked his Inuyasha's heavy scent. It was one of the best trails he had tracked. It was almost as good as Kagome's scent. His enhanced legs slowed as he came to the small clearing the hot spring was waiting for him. Looking at the ground, he could see the soft indents where Inuyasha had been far larger than he was before.

Looking carefully, he could even see the before and after-growth imprints. His tiny dainty feet and the larger majestic ones.

"Could it be the spring itself?" Koga asked himself. He looked into the bubbling water. He closed his eyes and thought about Inuyasha. The half-mutt turned muscular wonder. Kagome obviously wanted to be held in those strong arms. She wanted to kiss those beautifully sculpted muscles. She would rather be protected by him than Koga. Even her reasons for letting him stay, he was to be her back-up protector. Second fiddle to Inuyasha as he took on the stronger, more dangerous foes. Koga felt anger as his mind slowly cleared up from being away from Inuyasha.

"I'm like a child meant to protect the weaker child while father goes take care of business," Koga growled. His eyes opened with a hint of anger. "Well, two can play at this growing game." He chuckled. Stripping quickly, as it was evident by Inuyasha his old clothes won't fit anymore, and jumped in. "I'll become a better protector than you ever were."

The hot water covered much of his body but didn't seem to rise up despite him getting in. He shrugged and just relaxed. After a minute, he began to wonder if he was growing. It was hard to tell. He glanced to the side of the spring and picked up a rock and looked at it in his hand.

It took a few seconds but his demon eyes could see the rock slowly shrink in his hands. Glancing down, he watched as his abs became more sculpted. His arms were slowly puffing up more and more.

"Oh yes!" Koga said before jumping out of the wonderful water. As he looked over his body, he smiled.
1533112211112.title: In the forest, their search unsuccessful.

choices: Spurred on by his desire to beat Kouga, Inuyasha fights!
Spurred on by his desire to protect Kagome, Inuyasha fights!
15331122111121.content:
Kouga started walking back to his friends, holding that rock in his hand with a smile on his face. His body was starting to get bigger, his chest swelling outward as his abs were a tight, defined six pack. Kouga felt more powerful than he ever had before, and he was loving every second of it! He started getting taller and taller, his height seeming to increase in inches with every step he took! In moments he was a whole foot taller, and soon enough, two feet! "Aw yeah... This feels great..." He said under his breath!

Kouga soon had to put up with an issue that Inuyasha had to face, and that was making his way through the trees! Thankfully most of the path had already been cleared by the gigantic half demon, but he still got poked by the ocassional branch and it quickly became annoying! Kouga just kept thinking to himself of the look on Inuyasha's face when he returned, huge, if not even huger than Inuyasha himself! To have everyone worshipping him for being the biggest and the strongest!

- - -


"How much longer do you think Kouga will take?" Asked a curious Kagome.

"It shouldn't be TOO long." Shippo replied, "It didn't take us long to get there, and besides! He can run really fast!"

"Yeah, I suppose..." Kagome replied, twiddling her fingers together, "I just think that--"

"Oh come on!" Inuyasha interrupted, "Don't tell me you actually CARE what happens to him?" He told Kagome, feeling a bit jealous. After all, he was here and he was huge! Why worry over puny little Kouga when there was a huge hunk of a man right before her very eyes? "I mean really...!" Inuyasha grumbled. As soon as he saw that Kagome was looking up at him, he flexed one of his arms for her! The bicep pumped up, nearly to the size of a beach ball! Kagome blushed a little, feeling as her heart beat a little faster at the sight of such a man! Sango, too, was looking, through trying her best to stay out of Inuyasha and Kagome's little discussion.

"See? You can't even look away from me now!" Inuyasha said suddenly. A sort of sweet scent wafted down to Kagome's nose, making her feel a little light headed.

"I... Ah..." Kagome stammered, but before she could say another word, the ground beneath them started to rumble! Birds flew in fright and leaves fell from the trees. As the gang looked at the source of it all, the soon saw a gargantuan Kouga, grinning down at them! He must have been at least twice Inuyasha's size, with muscles that made Inuyasha's look like a kid!

"Hey guys!" Kouga said with a sly look on his face, "What do you think of the NEW me?" Kouga lifted his arms and flexed them as he puffed out his chest! He was a colossus of muscle, with a cocky grin on his face! His manhood had grown quite large, putting even Inuyasha's to shame! Sango gulped a little bit just looking at it!

"Now if you don't mind..." Kouga reached down and plucked Kagome right off the ground! "I'l juist be taking this!" He said with a devious smile!

"H-Hey!" Inuyasha shouted, reaching up at him and Kagome!
15331122111121.title: Reintroduction

choices: Inuyasha soon surpasses Kouga in size and power.
Both continue to grow at the same rate.
153311221111212.content:
Inuyasha looked up at the forty foot wolf demon and felt anger. Not at this guy finding the magic which made them grow. Not even at him becoming so large and muscular. No. It was the the fact this guy took Kagome from him. Even as she moved past him he could smell Kagome's fear. She was scared and this guy was the cause. This guy was scaring his Kagome.

He would punish Kouga for this transgression. He would show him who was truly meant to protect Kagome. And he would do it now.

Inuyasha took in deep breaths. With each large breath his body expanded quickly. He was growing faster now, edging up on the slower growing demon.

"Think you can beat me?" Kouga laughed as he held Kagome in one hand. With his mighty foot, he kicked Inuyasha. The growing half-demon caught the foot and felt his claws extend,

"Give me back Kagome!" Inuyasha yelled as his nails ripped into the foot's flesh. Kouga howled in pain as Inuyasha pressed on and pushed him back, to throw him off balance. Inuyasha was now equal to the full demon in size. Snarling, Kouga held Kagome close to the chest.

"Never mutt," Kouga growled back. He set his foot down on the ground, completely unharmed.

----

Having moved back from the others, Shippo, Miroku, Sango, and Kirara watched as the titanic demons went at it. They watched with open mouths as Inuyasha stare down Kouga. It was only Kirara who noticed a strange sound coming from nearby. She turned and looked at Shippo. The young fox demon was getting taller. He now stood equal to Miroku's waist! She made her trilling sound and looked at her growing friend.

"Shippo!" Sango yelled as she noticed the growing boy. His clothes were tight as his tiny body was developing some serious muscles despite the small frame.

"I'm growing?" he said in disbelief. He smiled. "Yes!"

"But why?" Miroku asked.

"The spring Inuyasha found. He started growing when he was in it," Shippo said as he reached Sango's chest. His abbs were visible now as he continued to inch taller and taller.

"Why didn't you mention that before?" Sango asked coldly.

"Well . . ." Shippo started.

"Forget that. Why didn't you grow earlier?" Miroku asked.

"I don't know. I just noticed Inuyasha growing slightly bigger and so I wanted to be bigger so he couldn't pick on me," Shippo said as he looked Miroku in the eyes.

"Maybe intent is important?" Miroku suggested when the earth shook. The three turned their eyes to the growing demons and Kagome being held high above Inuyasha by Koga's longer limb. The massive Inuyasha and Kouga must have been fifty feet tall as the former tried to overpower the demon. But it was obvious he didn't use his full power out of fear of harming Kagome.

"At this rate she'll be squeezed like a peach!" Sango yelled. Miroku looked at the now taller Shippo, his child-size clothes having long since given up on him, revealing some very nice looking muscles and foxy equipment.

"Not if someone can pull her out of there," Miroku said. Shippo turned with confusion before he realized both Sango and Miroku were looking at him. He smiled and nodded.

"Now it's my turn to protect Kagome!" he announced as he grew taller. He raced at the growing Titans.

-------

Koua growled as he held back Inuyasha. This wasn't how things were supposed to be. "I will beat you Mutt!" he growled. "You will not win!"

"Give . . . Me . . . Kagome!" Inuyasha growled back as he continued to get taller and stronger. He felt something run up his sculpted leg and then his back. He felt feet on his neck then head (and what he was sure was a kick or two). He looked up at the small figure launch itself at Kouga's hand and bite the wolf demon's hand hard. Kouga screamed and released Kagome as Shippo grabbed her and transformed into a big balloon. He lifted Kagome high into the air, away from the titans.

"Good work Shippo!" Inuyasha called as now he could give Koga his full intention. He would prove who was the better protector. He felt his body continue grow larger as he continued to hold Kouga close.
153311221111212.title: Don't Touch Kagome
